mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.created_at, u.name AS writer_name FROM notices n JOIN users u ON n.writer = u.id ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.created_at, n.writer, u.name AS writer_name FROM notices n JOIN users u ON n.writer = u.id WHERE n.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices (title, content, writer, created_at) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, NOW() )
